messages.title: YOUR CHOICE AT THIS ELECTION:
messages.content: Strong, stable leadership or a coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn.

messages.title: THE RISK IS JUST TOO BIG TO TAKE.
messages.content: Higher taxes, economic chaos and weaker defense are too big of a risk.

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit, Europe and our future outside of the EU is at the heart of this election.

images.caption: CRAIG WILLIAMS with various constituents and with Theresa May

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet emphasizes the choice between Theresa May's strong, stable leadership and the risk of Jeremy Corbyn's coalition leadership. It highlights the importance of Brexit and the economy as key issues.
